meanings.definition: In a manner free from sin.
meanings.sent1: She walked sinlessly through the garden, enjoying the flowers.
meanings.sent2: He always behaves sinlessly, never causing harm to others.
meanings.sent3: The cat sinlessly knocked over the vase, pretending it was an accident.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone sinlessly, casting a warm glow over the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed sinlessly, reflecting the clear blue sky above.

meanings.sent1: The child played sinlessly in the park, following all the rules.
meanings.sent2: She completed the task sinlessly, without making any mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel sinlessly stole a nut from the bird feeder, thinking it was a fair game.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew sinlessly, carrying the scent of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent5: The clock ticked sinlessly, marking the passage of time.
